product_name: Bergans of Norway Hugger 25 Pack - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With 2 large main compartments, Hugger lets you tuck away big items like a jacket and books, yet lets you tighten it up and strap it close to your back when you're on a minimal jaunt down the trail.
short_description: With 2 large main compartments, Hugger lets you tuck away big items like a jacket and books, yet lets you tighten it up and strap it close to your back when you're on a minimal jaunt down the trail.
